title: Download or install issues
body: Followed the email link but couldn't get it to work in the play store app. So I used the same link in Google Chrome and it poped up with a  button to authenticate and then install but it then never seemed to work as I don't have the app. It now says in installed, but it's not on my phone.

replies.body: ^ literally the exact same steps I took but no app installed on my phone as well.
